name: Number Wizard! (NekotoArts, FlameLizardCodes)
description:
Made for GEJam 5!

Made with Godot v3.5 RC 6

Objective

Go forth Math Wizard! Find a way to build the 2!

Make use of the boxes and your Math Wizardry to solve the puzzle!

Controls Keyboard

WASD - Movement

E - Interact / Pickup Boxes / Put down Boxes

Controller

Left Stick - Movement

Xbox "X" / Playstation "Square" - Interact / Pickup boxes / Putdown boxes
